summary:
Raider Helmet Retexture.
With custom Normal map.
descriptionHtml:
What is it?
It\'s a retexture of the Gjermundbu looking helmet Draugr\'s use in the game.
It\'s called \'Raider Helmet\' i belive

Contents in *.Rar file:
Retexture+custom normal map
Retexture+original normal map
Screenshots to compare.
Readme

Requirements:
RedXavier\'s Raider Helmet
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3947


**********Back Story**********

So i was probably like you, looking for that awesome helmet some of the Draugr\'s where using.
Not knowing what it was called i started to search google for answers.
A few topics popped up but nothing that was what i was searching for, but then suddenly i stumbled upon something called \"raider helmet\", and there it was in all its glory.

The only helmet in the entire game that looks somewhat similar to a viking helmet.
There was only one problem though, it had a very low resolution texture, specially the normal map, since it cludders the texture underneath too much.

So i took upon me this \"quest\" to fix that, an HD texture with an HD normal map.
And here is the result.

Now, the Normal map could use some more work, but since im only using Photshop to create this, this is what you get, i dont know blender or Maya or anything similar so i worked with a 3D model in 2D space, feel free however to make a better normal map, send it to me and i update the mod and credit you.


-=[CREDITS]=-

RedXavier for his wearable \"Raider Helmet\" mod, you can find it here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3947


Thank you.
author: Blackbeard
